short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes individual HN comments within their thread's context

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to skim Hacker News comment threads faster by providing one-line summaries of each comment. 

Requires a user-provided OpenAI API key (which is never exposed to the extension developer).

Code is open-source and available at https://github.com/jnnnthnn/hn-comment-summaries
